properties.name: Vol. 5. Plate, M. [Map bound by Butler St., Fourth Ave., First St., Hoyt St.; Including Douglass St., Degraw St., Union St., President St., Carroll St., Bond St., Gowanus Canal, Nevins St., Third Ave., Whitewell Pl., Denton Pl.]
properties.description: from Detailed estate and old farm line atlas of the city of Brooklyn : complete in six volumes ... from official records, private plans, and actual surveys ... / by G.M. Hopkins, C.E.
